descriptionHtml: BerryHunter.io will follow a "Game-as-an-Event" release model. That means while the server should mostly be online, support and maintenance can only be expected during communicated events like the current Playtest.
That also means the game will change and evolve from event to event - while the state in-between is not guaranteed in any way.

As you find bugs or have suggestions for the game,
let us know via our social media channels on the right.
Thank you very much for playing this early version of our game!

changes.description: Sharpen the rendering on high resolution displays.
You can now craft Berry Seeds that can be planted to grow new Berry Bushes. They last for 500 seconds and only produce half as many berries as wild Berry Bushes.

A large mammoth now roams the island. They move slowly, but don't stand in their way! They will trample anyone and anything in their path and are tough to take down. Their massive horns make for good weapons, though.
Titanium shards will now spawn randomly on the island and can be harvested for 3 Titanium.
We introduced new character models, including different facial hair and beards. The looks are based on your name, so the same name will always give you the same look.
Nothing lasts forever, and now, neither do placeables. Check the balance for more info.
Sabertooth HP reduced from 150 to 120.
Furnace livetime reduced from infinite to 1200 seconds.
Wild Berry Bushes now only produce half as many berries.
Workbench and Siege Workbench lifetime reduced from infinite to 1800 seconds.
Wood Walls lifetime reduced from infinite to 1800 seconds.
Stone Walls lifetime reduced from infinite to 2400 seconds.
Bronze Walls lifetime reduced from infinite to 4800 seconds.
Stone Walls no longer require Wood Walls as an ingredient but now require an extra 30 Wood.
Bronze Walls no longer require Stone Walls as an ingredient but now require an extra 40 Wood and 30 Stone.
Fixed an issue where placeables would not be shown on the minimap anymore.
Fixed an issue where the game could crash during the tutorial.
All placeable objects, except for campfires, are now shown on the mini-map.
Punch punch now has new swing sound.
Walls are now visible on the MiniMap.
Berrybushes now make a sound when harvested.
The tutorial will no longer be automatically enabled if you have completed it once.
Chat now shows lower case letter as well, not just UPPER CASE.
Health, Hunger and Temperature increases are now also shown in the HUD.
Improved the damage indicator on mobs and other players.
Added anti-alisaing for minimap icons.
